title: Fluffy Friends
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>There, there, Hanpen, good girl.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>She’s very well behaved.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Mia-chan, want to try petting her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I’m okay...... I don’t really know how to play with Hanpen anyway.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>In NYC, I didn’t run into stray cats often, so I’m not really into cats.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Really? Are there no animals there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Oh, no, there are animals. I usually see squirrels. Whenever I go to the park, I always see many plump, round squirrels around the trees.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Squirrels....... I’d like to see them in person. Will you take me to see them sometime?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Of course! I’d take you anytime, Rina!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
